options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount), (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount), (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM default.flows_policy_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642198255) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642200055)
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawSql:
select SUM(octetDeltaCount) as bytes, egressNetworkPolicyName as source, ingressNetworkPolicyName as destination
From flows
WHERE sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndMilli)
GROUP BY source, destination

options.text: Default value of text input option

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount),  (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount),  (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) AS pair
FROM default.flows_policy_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642198301) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642200101)
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair
targets.rawSql:
select SUM(reverseOctetDeltaCount) as bytes, egressNetworkPolicyName as source, ingressNetworkPolicyName as destination
From flows
WHERE sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndMilli)
GROUP BY source, destination

panels.title: Cumulative Reverse Bytes of Network Policy

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, AVG(throughput), (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, AVG(throughput), (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair
FROM default.flows_policy_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642546973) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642547273)
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT flowEndSeconds as time, CONCAT(egressNetworkPolicyName, '->', ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair, SUM(throughput) as np
FROM flows
WHERE sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndMilli)
GROUP BY time, pair
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, AVG(reverseThroughput), (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSeconds), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, AVG(reverseThroughput), (egressNetworkPolicyName, ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair
FROM default.flows_policy_view
WHERE flowEndSeconds >= toDateTime(1642198241) AND flowEndSeconds <= toDateTime(1642200041)
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY pair, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT flowEndSeconds as time, CONCAT(egressNetworkPolicyName, '->', ingressNetworkPolicyName) as pair, SUM(reverseThroughput) as np
FROM flows
WHERE sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND (egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 OR ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1)
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndMilli)
GROUP BY time, pair
ORDER BY time

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), egressNetworkPolicyName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY egressNetworkPolicyName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromSourceNode), egressNetworkPolicyName
FROM default.flows_policy_view
WHERE flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode >= toDateTime(1642547038) AND flowEndSecondsFromSourceNode <= toDateTime(1642547338) 
AND egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY egressNetworkPolicyName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT flowEndSeconds as time, egressNetworkPolicyName, SUM(throughput) as np
FROM flows
WHERE sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndMilli)
GROUP BY time, egressNetworkPolicyName
ORDER BY time

SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount) as np, egressNetworkPolicyName
FROM flows
WHERE sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND egressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND egressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndMilli)
GROUP BY egressNetworkPolicyName

panels.title: Cumulative Bytes of Egress Network Policy

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT $timeSeries as t, SUM(throughputFromDestinationNode), ingressNetworkPolicyName
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter 
AND ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY ingressNetworkPolicyName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT (intDiv(toUInt32(flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode), 60) * 60) * 1000 as t, SUM(throughputFromDestinationNode), ingressNetworkPolicyName
FROM default.flows_policy_view
WHERE flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode >= toDateTime(1642545439) AND flowEndSecondsFromDestinationNode <= toDateTime(1642547239) 
AND ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1 
AND sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
GROUP BY ingressNetworkPolicyName, t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawSql:
SELECT flowEndSeconds as time, ingressNetworkPolicyName, SUM(throughput) as np
FROM flows
WHERE sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndMilli)
GROUP BY time, ingressNetworkPolicyName
ORDER BY time

SELECT SUM(octetDeltaCount) as np, ingressNetworkPolicyName
FROM flows
WHERE sourcePodNamespace NOT IN ('kube-system', 'flow-visibility', 'flow-aggregator')
AND ingressNetworkPolicyName != ''
AND ingressNetworkPolicyRuleAction == 1
AND $__timeFilter(flowEndMilli)
GROUP BY ingressNetworkPolicyName

panels.title: Cumulative Bytes of Ingress Network Policy
